subject: Report
body:
Looking for an effective and cheap solution? Tired with your sexual problems? 
Click here to be the best lover in the world!
With Viagra from RX Online Drug Store you will have perfect sex.
Click here to become a sex giant
There is no need to visit your local drug store at all.
With best regards,
Barbara Sexton
 
 
Pustiaki. Kazalos, plechi ego upiraiutsia v Nebo. Bez truda ulovlennaia eshche v Siiaiushchem nezrimaia sviaz, natianuvshaiasia mezhdu Namestnikom i ego telohranitelnicej Podobno uprugoj tetive, govorila ob ochen blizkih otnosheniiah etoj parochki. On chuvstvoval sebia neprikaiannym. 
Sprava ot Celitelia priamo v vozduhe materializovalas Zhenshchina. Nekoe drevnee, instinktivnoe oshchushchenie gibelnoj opasnosti. Zhutkaia, bezumnaia bol, razryvaiushchaia soznanie na chasti. chto zh, razumno, chut krivo ulybnulsia Linlan Holod, kazalos Niskolko ne udivivshis moemu otkazu. Ia uvidel eto, i serdce moe edva ne razorvalos na chasti. O Prorochestve haskov, povelitel! O Mirazre, kotorogo oni nazyvaiut Svetochem. Posle etogo chuvstvuesh Sebia mestnym zhitelem, zabyvaia proshluiu zhizn nachisto. Znaiu, Znaiu, chto ty hochesh skazat: mne samomu nuzhna pomoshch. 
Mag edva ne progovorilsia. Nori pozhala plechami. Bankos? No u menia est. Zatem do menia Doshlo, i ia s kakim-to strannym oblegcheniem prinialsia rastvoriat obraz Pressa V mozgu. ejisuminyon XF5FVVtTW1Z0QllXUkAbREVSQFBDXlxbG1JT
